Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible (Warning: there are a few reports of game crashes on old AMD cards. the developer is currently unable to reproduce.)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 is still highly recommended. DirectX 9 may have random crashes. For testing purpose, You can find a big town map within the first 20 minutes of gameplay. If you can stay there for a few minutes and the game does not crash, then you are likely fine.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GFX 770 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
  • Additional Notes: The setting above is recommended because it's very close to my development machine. Thus, it is less likely to get hardware-related issues.
